TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "mossy_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 48, "index": 13}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 37, "index": 14}, {"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 6, "index": 15}, {"type": "blue_ice", "quantity": 7, "index": 20}, {"type": "crimson_stairs", "quantity": 22, "index": 29}, {"type": "iron_bars", "quantity": 37, "index": 35}, {"type": "infested_stone", "quantity": 56, "index": 38}, {"type": "purple_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 49, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft polished_andesite_stairs, I need to place 3 polished_andesite in the crafting table. I will start by moving 1 polished_andesite from slot 15 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1
